suggestions.original: To further enhance the color richness of the artwork, consider incorporating more gradient transitions and shading to add depth and dimension to the characters and background elements. Additionally, using a wider variety of color tones within each hue can create a more nuanced and sophisticated palette. Experimenting with complementary and analogous color schemes can also add visual interest and harmony to the piece.
